format.name: HighlightedSectionsCountChecker
format.description: The argument value must contain exactly 6 sections highlighted using markdown syntax (e.g., *highlighted section* or **highlighted section**). Each section must not be empty.

fn_schema.name: summarize_text_content
fn_schema.description: Generates a concise summary of the input text while preserving key information.

text_content.description: The text content that needs to be summarized. The argument value must contain exactly 6 sections, each not empty, with each section highlighted using markdown syntax (for example, *highlighted section* or **highlighted section**).

summary_length.description: Preferred length of the summary in number of sentences.

focus_area.description: Specify the focus area for content prioritization.

The authors recommend incorporating structured exercise programs into public health initiatives." Remember, focus on the conclusion.
